news_header: Taxes paid in 2024 reached EUR 81.7 billion, an increase from 2023.
news_text: In 2024, taxes paid amounted to EUR 81.7 billion, which is EUR 100 million more than in 2023, according to the Tax Administration. The highest revenue came from personal income tax, VAT, and income tax, with personal income tax contributing EUR 38 billion. Despite a decrease in the number of earners, tax accruals increased due to wage and pension index increases. VAT totaled EUR 21.4 billion.
